column4: Oh now this is slick... This is how Ubuntu should be by default hehe. I've got Unity, GNOME 3 and KDE 4 all installed heehee!
Can switch to whichever environment I want at the login screen
you can have any number of desktops and window managers installed as you want :)
hehe I installed something (I've been installing everything that moves in Ubuntu Software Center LOL!) and it brought along KDE with it and switched my login screen to kdm..
